Simply copy and paste from this page or even better download our free guide to keep on your phone. Instagram will only allow a maximum of 30 hashtags per post so here we‚Äôve done the hard work for you. Below you‚Äôll find popular genres of photography and the best 30 photography hashtags related to that style which also include comparable hashtags ensuring you reach a wider audience. Simply add them into the description of your post and watch your likes and followers grow! Hashtagging is essential for photographers because it helps categorize similar content and makes your work discoverable, which is why correctly hashtagged posts get much more engagement.
